text: Hi Paul, I apologise  for my late response  and many thanks for sending me those websites. Those will definitely help me to understand more about Houdini. I already have the apprentice version and of course I am on it.

I wanted to ask how would I make a showreel? I meant, when I have time I am doing some simulation stuff but I do not how long it has to be or where hall I focus to make a great showreel? 

I am hope everything is going well and thanks for your time.
